description: This file defines a C++ class named Response in the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, which extends the Message class and provides methods related to JSON-RPC responses such as getId, isResult, getResult, isError, getError, and isValid.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC response message with methods to access response details.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the response.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if the response contains a result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result JSON object if present.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the response contains an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error JSON object if present.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Checks if the response message is valid.
